name: SkyHunter (StefanoF12)
description:
A 3D version of Sunless Sea, with more sun and less sea.

Sky Hunter is a narrative adventure video game with exploration and game-book elements.

The story revolves around a captain who lost his whole family due to a flying whale attack and the player exploring the world will unravel its secrets and eventually find the giant monster.

KEY FEATURES

Game features:

  • Hunt for stories;
  • Discover unique and surreal places;
  • Lose yourself in the journey.

DEVELOPED BY: 

UnderdogsGameDevelopments (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 3 - 2020/2021)

GAME DESIGN: Simone Erbeia, Tommaso Brena, Tommaso Tonella, Lorenzo Fossati , Stefano Colucci

GAME PROGRAMMING: Michael Rizzolo, Filippo Calmasini, Edoardo Basile

GAME 3D ART: Mattia Sentati, Andrea Riccio, Francesco Riccio, Francesco Stefanini

GAME CONCEPT ART: Loris Corda, Joey Ruberto, Alessia Tricarico, Letizia Previte, Andrea Stanga

GAME AUDIO PRODUCTION: Loris Ronchi
